products.title: Utopia Mist Vertical Blind
products.description: This utopia mist vertical blind is the very softest of greys almost white and each vane perfectly woven to allow a gentle stream of light to bathe your home in a warm and inviting glow. Perfect for a modern home, the blind will give you a smart, sophisticated and streamlined this utopia mist vertical blind is the very softest of greys almost white and each vane perfectly woven to allow a gentle stream of light to bathe your home in a warm and inviting glow.

products.title: Utopia Country Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Utopia country grey is an accurate name for this vertical blind thats bursting with elegant colouring and tasteful texture. The woven fabric has tones of warmth and classicalness to it, whilst of course bursting with rustic vibes. This blind will work so well in a room of ne utopia country grey is an accurate name for this vertical blind thats bursting with elegant colouring and tasteful texture.

products.title: Utopia Slate Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: For a sleek and contemporary look, this utopia slate grey vertical blind is just the thing. Made from sleek, light filtering fabric, each vane is woven so that it can let light trickle through to give your room a beautiful ambient glow. As well as a streamlined look thanks to th for a sleek and contemporary look, this utopia slate grey vertical blind is just the thing.

products.title: Granite Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The matt grey finish on the granite aluminium blind makes this an excellent choice for any window in your home. Tilt, raise and lower this blind to take full control over the light entering your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Palate Gunmetal Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Grey Perfora Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The grey perfora aluminium blind is unique with it's small light filtering holes, this will let more light in than other blinds, even when closed, but they help this blind to act more like a screen - gently filtering the light. Best used where privacy is not the most important feature of the blind, but being able to allow the light in is most important. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Ash Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This ash grey blackout vertical blind adds a bold trending shade to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new grey blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this dark grey vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Roma, Fuscous Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room, easing it in gently without disturbing you. The fuscous grey is miles ahead when it comes to modern style, and will work beautifully with equally trendy yellows and bright pinks, both perfect colour schemes for an up-to-date living room, bedroom, or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Grey Nickel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be pulled aside or tilted with ease. Offset the grey nickel with sunny yellows, fruity limes, or bright oranges to create a trendy and charming colour scheme. Use these striking colour combinations in a bright home office, a relaxing dining room, or a welcoming spare bedroom.

products.title: Roma, Athens Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends itself to a coordinating charcoal and dove grey colour scheme, ideal for a home office; or to a palette of deep forest greens and pale greys in the den, complemented by medium, polished woods.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in ths modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.
